name: Pideaky
headline: We help offline LatAm SMBs manage and accelerate their cash-flow
description:
Pideaky helps offline LatAm SMBs manage and accelerate their cash flow through AI collection agents, which remind, collect, and negotiate bills on behalf of SMBS in Latam.
We focus on the massively underserved $70B/year customer segment as our wedge — Mexican corner shops and corner shop providers:

founders.name: Carlos Tejeda, Founder
founders.description:
- CEO and co-founder of Pideaky, we help LatAm SMBs manage and accelerate cash flow. 
- CEO and founder Of Orca Wireless, we developed a  wireless internet network and served more than 250K customers in Northern Mexico.(exited) 
- Founder and CEO at RC  ( Payphone factory, 1996-2007), we produced and exported Payphone to Mexico and Latam. Our main end customers were small corner shops.

CTO at Pideaky
Coding since age 7. Demos, Games 2d & 3d, VR (Quest Unity & UE), Raytracers, ERP&ERMs, Android Apps, Financial Transactions systems, Card Payments.

Wrote the whole GRC intranet system

Assembler (Ex MC68x, X86), C/C++, Perl, PHP, SQL, Pascal, MSVB, Java, JS, HTML/CSS...
Linux, OpenWRT, Apache, MySQL, AmigaOS

founders.name: Rafael Tejeda Elizondo, Founder
founders.description:
Rafael Tejeda Elizondo: Founder "Pideaky" (YCS21) 
Rafael Graduate from Instituto Tecnológico y de Estudios Superiores de Monterrey, Bs Law (1992) and MS in Technology Commercialization, University of Texas , Austin Red-McCombs Business School & CIMAV (2010)

generated_description:
### Pideaky: Accelerating Cash Flow for LatAm SMBs

Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator’s Batch S21, **Pideaky** is on a mission to help offline small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs) in Latin America manage and boost their cash flow. Based in Monterrey, Mexico, the company is tackling the massive $70 billion/year market primarily consisting of local corner stores and vendors.

#### How Pideaky Works

Pideaky’s approach relies on advanced AI collection agents that seamlessly remind, collect, and negotiate invoices on behalf of its SMB clients. This saves business owners valuable time and reduces the stress associated with managing collections on their own. 

The process is straightforward:
1. **Upload Your Loan Book**: Businesses simply upload their customer payment details.
2. **Automated Reminders**: Customers receive reminders via WhatsApp or email, enhancing payment compliance.
3. **Effortless Payments**: Payments are reconciled automatically, allowing business owners to focus on what truly matters—their growth.

#### Products and Services

Pideaky offers two key products:
- **Loans**: Access to capital that allows businesses to expand more quickly.
- **Collection Management**: Tools to automate the reminder and reconciliation processes, leading to faster cash flow.

The platform has integrated over **17,000 cash payment points**, making it convenient for business owners and their customers to settle payments through popular retailers like Walmart and Super7.

#### The Team and Support

With a compact team of three, Pideaky operates efficiently under the guidance of Group Partner Diana Hu. The feedback from users highlights the time-saving benefits of the service; clients need not juggle the complexities of manual collections any longer.

#### Value Proposition

Why should a business owner consider Pideaky? Here’s what they offer:
- **Speed**: Get paid faster with automated reminders and streamlined processes.
- **Simplicity**: Reduce the headaches of manual tracking and reconciliation.
- **Variety**: Clients can offer diverse payment options to their customers, increasing convenience.

By addressing the financial challenges of underserved locales in Latin America, Pideaky has positioned itself as a vital tool for SMBs, providing them not only with necessary liquidity but also with a robust way to maintain cash flow.

For more information, visit their website at [Pideaky](https://pideaky.com/en/).
